wikipedia_page.main: Charles John Mare (1815 – 8 February 1898) was a British Conservative politician, and shipbuilder.

response: Thomas Ditchburn retired in 1847 and the business was carried on by Charles Mare, under the name of C.J. Mare and Company. He was joined by naval architect James Ash, who later began his own shipyard at Cubitt Town.
